offerList.title: ATVS traveling
offerList.description: Join exciting rafting expeditions on the waterways of the Carpathians. Go through challenging waterways and overcome gusty waves, feel the adrenaline, and enjoy the incredible views of the surrounding mountains.

offerList.title: Rock climbing
offerList.description: Overcome the peaks of the Carpathians in a unique way - climbing. Make your own way to the heights and find inner peace in the embrace of the mighty rocks.

offerList.title: Hot air ballooning
offerList.description: Feel Zen over the mountain peaks! Hot air ballooning gives you incredible impressions and panoramas of the Carpathians that seem endless.

offerList.title: Skydiving
offerList.description: Fly in the sky over the Carpathians! Experienced instructors will help you realize your dream of free flight. Remember the incredible emotions and panoramas from a bird's eye view forever.

offerList.title: Rafting
offerList.description: Join exciting rafting expeditions on the waterways of the Carpathians. Go through challenging waterways and overcome gusty waves, feel the adrenaline, and enjoy the incredible views of the surrounding mountains.
